C

CAP_ANIMATED - Static variable in class jhave.core.Visualizer
The visualizer is animated, default is slide show style.

The visualizer is controllable.
CAP_GOTO_FRAME - Static variable in class jhave.core.Visualizer
Visualizer supports going directly to a specified frame.
CAP_PAUSE - Static variable in class jhave.core.Visualizer
Visualizer supports pausing play.
CAP_PLAY - Static variable in class jhave.core.Visualizer
The visualizer supports playing frames / key frames in succession.

The visualizer supports stepping backward.
CAP_STEP_FORWARD - Static variable in class jhave.core.Visualizer
The visualizer supports stepping forward.
CAP_STOP - Static variable in class jhave.core.Visualizer
Visualizer supports stopping play.
CAP_ZOOM - Static variable in class jhave.core.Visualizer
Visualizer supports zooming.

D

DocumentationListener - Interface in jhave.event
Listener for Objects who want to know when a Visualizer changes documents.

Event used for encapsulating information sent to DocumentationListeners.

F

FC_CONNECT_TO_SERVER - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
1 (String category) | (Vector algorithmList) Requests a connection to the server.
FC_PONG - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
2 [String message] Response to a ping from the server.
FC_REQUEST_GENERATED_SCRIPT - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
4 (Algorithm algorithm.GetAlgoName()) ("old" or "new") (String parameters) Requests the server to generate a script and send it to the client.
FC_REQUEST_PING - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
-99 [String message] Requests the server to Ping the Client.
FC_REQUEST_STATIC_SCRIPT - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
3 (String algorithm.GetAlgoName) Requests a static script to be sent to the Client.
FC_SUBMIT_ANSWER_TO_QUESTION - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
5 (String algorithm.GetAlgoName()) (String question ID) (String answer) Submits the students answer to an asked question to the server.

Creates a new instance of FIBQuestion

Fire a DocumentEvent to all registered DocumentationListeners.
fireQuestionEvent(Question) - Method in class jhave.core.Visualizer
Fire a QuestionEvent to all registered listeners.
FS_ALGORITHM_NEEDS_INPUT - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
401 [String message] Specifys that the given input is not enough to generated the algorithm.
FS_ERROR_EXISTING_DATASET_NOT_VALID_FOR_REQUESTED_ALGORITHM - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
404 [String message] The dataset that was last used is not valid for the requested algorithm.
FS_ERROR_GETTING_GENERATED_SCRIPT - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
402 [String reason] An error occured while trying to generate the script, possibly the script is not available on the server.
FS_ERROR_GETTING_QUIZ - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
408 [String error] There was an error loading the requested quiz, possibly server trouble.
FS_ERROR_GETTING_STATIC_SCRIPT - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
301 [String reason] [String scriptName] [String message] An error occured while trying to retrieve the Script.
FS_EVALUATED_QUESTION - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
501 [String unknown] Not sure at the functionality of this code.
FS_FINAL_RESULTS_TO_QUIZ_AND_LAST_QUESTION - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
502 ("theKey") (String message)or((String number of questions) (String questions correct) ("1")) Sends the final quiz results to the client.
FS_INVALID_NAME_OR_PASSWORD - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
406 [String message] An invalid username or password was used to log into the server.
FS_LOGIN_CONFIRMATION - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
100 [String message] Confirms to the client that a connection has been established.
FS_LOGIN_DENIAL - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
101 [String Message] Informs the client that their connection has been denied.
FS_NO_QUIZ_IN_DATABASE - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
405 [String message] An error occured while trying to access the request quiz, possibly the quiz is not on this server.
FS_PING - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
200 [String Message] Sends a ping to the client to see if it is still there.
FS_QUIZ_TIME_EXPIRED - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
407 [String error] You quiz you have requested is no longer available.
FS_SEND_GENERATED_SCRIPT - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
400 (String scriptName) (String visualizer) | (String script) Server sends a generated script to the client.
FS_SEND_STATIC_SCRIPT - Static variable in interface jhave.core.TransactionCodes
300 (String scriptName) (String visualizer) | (String script) Server sends a static (non-generated) to the client.
